name: Traffic timmy
description:
Traffic Timmy is a game that was made for the 27th Curdle Game Jam!

Timmy has to make sure that the cars don't crash into each other and control incoming traffic. Keep playing to try and beat that highscore!

Controls:

WASD or the arrow keys to move

Holding "R" will pull out your Stop Sign

How to play:

Hold out your Stop sign using "R" to slow down incoming cars so they don't crash into each other

Increase your score by getting the cars to their intended goal and by collecting coins

Btw this is my first ever game jam (that I completed legitimately) Hope you like it :)
